title: Infinite Heroes
description: Infinite Heroes is a board card game where you must join the magical world of adventure. Challenge the monster army and defeat the demon. Simple at first glance, the game will present you with complex challenges. Creatures, artifacts, portals, spells, and heroes. Play as a tireless adventurer, a powerful magician, a great warlock, or any of the eight heroes! Get loot and treasure to win. As you progress, the strength of your opponents will also grow, and to win, you need to think through every step.
